summary: Test suite that verifies the functionality of the StableUnCLIP image generation and image‑to‑image diffusion pipelines, including fast unit tests with mocked components and comprehensive integration tests on real models across GPU/CPU and offloading configurations.
business_intent: Automate validation of StableUnCLIP pipelines to ensure consistent output, correct handling of advanced features (e.g., attention slicing, xformers), and reliable performance on various hardware setups, thereby preventing regressions and supporting continuous integration.
